description: Intelligence officials says the video, which purported to show a Haitian immigrant claiming he had voted multiple times in Georgie, is the product of a Russian propaganda operation.
title: Fake videos from Russian propagandists aim to raise tensions ahead of Election Day

description: It is hard to estimate how many ballots will be affected by the decision or whether it will ultimately impact the outcome of the presidential election.
title: Supreme Court sides with Democrats in Pennsylvania voting case

description: President Biden has issued a number of immigration-related executive actions that mimic those of the Trump administration, and VP Harris has promised she’ll continue restrictive policies.
title: Pushed by public opinion shift, Democrats adopt immigration restrictions

description: The death rate for Marburg virus is nearly 90%. There are no approved vaccines and treatments. So how did Rwanda achieve what one doctor calls an "unprecedented" success in controlling its outbreak?
title: An 'unprecedented' good news story about a potentially deadly viral outbreak

description: There are rules and norms in place in conflicts meant to shield civilians from the worst harms of war. But human rights groups say lately they're being ignored or broken. Our correspondent has been covering two wars in which many of the laws of war are being flouted.
title: Are Countries Ignoring the Laws of War?

description: Investigators said warden Andrew Ciolli should have stopped abuse of prisoners. He faced disciplinary action. Now he's the director of a federal center that teaches others how to run prisons.
title: A warden faced discipline over abuse at a prison. Now he runs a prison training site

description: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump have both appealed to workers in this year's election. But the candidates’ stances on many issues affecting workers remain far apart.
title: Here’s where Trump and Harris stand on 5 issues affecting workers

description: The Sudanese city of Omdurman lives in the shadow of war, facing daily shelling and battered medical services. But some people are trying to eke out a return to life, however precarious.
title: Life in a city in the grip of Sudan’s brutal war

description: Former President Trump plans to stop in Dearborn, Mich — a city where a majority of people are Arab American. He and Vice President Harris are each holding Friday night rallies in Milwaukee.
title: Trump, Harris return to the Blue Wall ahead of the final campaign weekend

description: A bear attack was initially suspected in Dustin Kjersem’s death. But police now say he was killed by a man he had just met -- and that a beer can offered by Kjersem provided critical DNA evidence.
title: Montana camper offered his killer a beer -- and it held suspect's DNA, sheriff says

description: Spending on campaign ads is up $1 billion from four years ago, according to data from AdImpact, analyzed by NPR. The state that's been the target of the most money is Pennsylvania.
title: More than $10 billion has been spent on ads in the 2024 election

description: Sources told AP that protocol was not followed in editing a transcript of a call the president had with Latino activists responding to comments made by comedian Tony Hinchcliffe at a Trump rally.
title: Questions arise over White House transcript of Biden call to Latino activists

description: Harris and Trump look toward undecided voters in Arizona and Nevada as a pathway to the White House. And, the U.S. economy sees solid growth.
title: Harris and Trump head West to woo voters. And, U.S. economy sees solid growth

description: Through her her independent documentary project Rainbow Girls, photographer Julia Gunther captures the stories of protection and prejudice among a group of South African lesbian women.
title: Rainbow Girls: 10 Years of Protection and Prejudice

description: "Let's see how she feels about it, you know, when the guns are trained on her face," Trump said while criticizing Cheney's support of the U.S.-led conflicts in the Middle East.
title: Trump, using violent language, attacks 'war hawk' Liz Cheney

description: "Let's see how she feels about it, you know, when the guns are trained on her face," Trump said while criticizing Cheney's support of the U.S.-led conflicts in the Middle East.
title: Trump, using violent language, attacks 'war hawk' Liz Cheney

description: Boeing’s machinists union leaders are endorsing the company’s latest contract offer, setting the stage for a vote on Monday that could end the seven week-long strike.
title: Boeing’s striking machinists union will vote Monday on a new contract offer

description: Many Muslim and Arab American voters are leaning toward third-party candidates or not voting, feeling neither main candidate values their families' lives. Others are choosing between Harris and Trump.
title: First Gaza, now Lebanon: How support for Israel’s war is influencing Michigan voting

description: Former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the last election put a spotlight on what are essentially ministerial steps between Election Day and Inauguration Day. Here are the key dates ahead.
title: Here are the key Electoral College dates to keep in mind ahead of Inauguration Day

description: We asked visual search scientists, a metal-detecting enthusiast and a detective to share the most effective strategies to find missing objects.
title: How to find lost objects: 6 techniques that really work

description: North Carolina has more rural voters than any other 2024 presidential swing state, and canvassing groups are working to turn out voters in one purple county as early voting continues in the state.
title: Support from rural Democrats will be crucial for Harris to win this swing state

description: This week's news quiz mixes celebrities and politics. But hey, they started it. Were you paying attention?
title: Who said 'I hate politics' — then endorsed Harris? Find out in the quiz

description: The function can be used manually or automatically. It is available now for certain users, and will be accessible for other users on a rolling basis.
title: OpenAI is rolling out a web search feature for ChatGPT

description: Boeing overcharged the Air Force nearly $1 million for spare parts on C-17 cargo planes, including an 8,000% markup for simple lavatory soap dispensers, according to the Pentagon's inspector general.
title: Boeing cleaned up on Air Force parts, including soap dispensers marked up 8,000%
